channel.title: 2014 World Cup
channel.description: There's only four days until the World Cup begins, and I'm really excited to follow it. I'm hoping for Argentina to take home the trophy. What country is everyone here supporting?

item.title: 2014 World Cup
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

My face was covered with tears of joy while looking at Messi with his head tilted down in disappointment.

Read full topic

item.title: 2014 World Cup
item.dc:creator: @Phillipe Phillipé
item.description:
@Phillipe wrote:

[quote=“sertan8, post:201, topic:543798”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=662678.msg4436665#msg4436665 date=1405289482]
Someone like to tell me how Messi got the golden ball? Are FIFA blind?
[/quote]

exactly my thoughts.[/quote]

Because in terms of attacking football Argentina played better and largely in part due to Messi’s performance? The only thing attacking wise Germany were better than based on statistics alone was delivering crosses into the area. The styles of the two teams just made for a boring game, not to mention that Argentina are absolutely toilet duck defensively in comparison to Germany. Argentina has always been known for their promise going forward and nothing else, they’re lackluster in every other aspect of the game other than carving out oppertunities and the statistics don’t lie - they were the best team at doing that, unfortunately they weren’t able to capitalise on that due to injuries pre-world cup.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:209, topic:543798”][quote author=DeathsChaos9 link=topic=662678.msg4436728#msg4436728 date=1405309928]
If The Third Reich won the World Cup feel free to post a Nazi flag, otherwise its just spam and/or flamebait.
[/quote]I don’t have a single clue as to what you’re talking about, good sir. Also, I do know the clear difference between the two, I was just making a joke.[/quote]
I’ve PMed you in regards to that.

Read full topic

item.description:

Someone like to tell me how Messi got the golden ball? Are FIFA blind?

this. Messi was terrible and is super overrated.

Should’ve been Robben who got it IMO.
[/quote]

maybe even muller the guy had an insane world cup.[/quote]

Yeah Muller had a good run.

[quote=“lesterknome, post:203, topic:543798”]Man towards the end that game started to get… Messi

[spoiler][/spoiler][/quote]

Gotze admit that Germany played well.

I’ll be here all week.
